body:
If the "right" way to support ChaCha20 and ChaCha20Poly1305 is to use the x/crypto repo as "staging area" for the main repo, maybe [this implementation](https://github.com/enceve/crypto/tree/master/chacha20) is stable and fast enough. It is similar to the salsa20 package, uses SIMD SSE2 for ChaCha20 on amd64 and avoids mem-allocs for the Poly1305 part of the AEAD.
There is still room for performance improvements, but maybe it can be used as a template...
